detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 1
detailed_analysis.text: So climate change is very real thing and the fact supports this.

grammar.corrected_text: To climate change is very real thing and the fact supports this.

detailed_analysis.judgment: Slight grammatical bumps — barely noticeable though. This section wanders off-topic; try anchoring it closer to the core discussion. Your tone feels warm and confident — it’s pleasant to read. Even-tempered expression — clear without being flat.

detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 2
detailed_analysis.text: Climate change Climate is changing due to a lot of pollution and we cannot face these disasters.

grammar.corrected_text: Climate change Climate is changing due to a lot of pollution and we cannot face these disasters.

detailed_analysis.judgment: Flawless grammar. Everything reads clean and natural. Not entirely on theme — refocusing would make it more coherent. Comes off somewhat negative; try framing critiques in a more constructive tone. Controlled emotion — maintains a professional tone. Critical tone plus low relevance makes it sound disconnected — refocus your argument.

speaker_summary.Speaker 1: Grammar needs a bit of fine-tuning, though your ideas come through strongly. You sometimes lose sight of the topic; clearer linkage would help.
speaker_summary.Speaker 2: Not a single grammatical flaw; it’s all very natural. Some contributions feel detached from the core theme — try re-anchoring them.
